feeEducation: Sending payments and making exchanges include a small fee for service security and maintenance.
inviteMoneyEscrow: We’ll invite this contact and keep their funds safe until they verify their account.
keepMoneySafe: We'll keep this money safe until your friend creates a {{appName}} account
searchFriends: Try entering a phone number if you are unable to find who you're looking for
searchForSomeone: Search for someone using their name, phone number, or address
inviteSMS: Welcome to {{appName}}! Get {{appName}} at {{link}} and enter your code to get started: {{code}}
inviteSMSWithEscrowedPayment: Welcome to {{appName}}! I've sent you Celo Dollars. Go to {{link}} and enter your code to get started: {{code}}
writeStorageNeededForQrDownload: Storage write permission is needed for downloading the QR code
cameraScanInfo: Center code in the box above
cameraNotAuthorizedDescription: Please enable the Camera in your phone’s Settings. You’ll need it to scan QR codes.

verificationCta.body: Verify your phone and sync your contacts to quickly send to your friends.

importContactsCta.body: Please enable Contacts in your phone’s Settings to find your friends by name.

secureSendExplanation.body1: {{e164PhoneNumber}} has multiple accounts associated with it. {{displayName}} could have created a new {{appName}} account, or may have lost their phone or had their account compromised.
secureSendExplanation.body1NoDisplayName: Your contact has multiple accounts associated with it. Your contact could have created a new {{appName}} account, or may have lost their phone or had their account compromised.
secureSendExplanation.body2: You must scan their QR code or confirm their account number before transacting.

confirmAccountNumber.title: Confirm Account Number
confirmAccountNumber.bodyPartial: Please ask {{displayName}} for the last four digits of their account number. It's safest to do this in person or by phone.
confirmAccountNumber.bodyPartialNoDisplayName: Please ask your contact for the last four digits of their account number. It's safest to do this in person or by phone.
confirmAccountNumber.body1Full: Please ask {{displayName}} for their account number.
confirmAccountNumber.body1FullNoDisplayName: Please ask your contact for their account number.
confirmAccountNumber.body2Full: We strongly recommend asking in person or over the phone, through WhatsApp or Messenger, or by email. For security, please do not use text messaging (SMS).

helpModal.body1: Account numbers (also known as addresses) are located in the menu. From the Home screen, open the menu by tapping the icon in the top left corner.
helpModal.body2: The account number is near the bottom of the menu.
helpModal.body3: Account numbers begin with "0x" and are 42 characters long

transferAddressChanged: This contact changed their account number since the transaction. This payment was sent to:
